content: चलित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [चल्-क्त] {@--1@} Shaken, moved, stirred, agitated. {@--2@} Gone, departed; एवमुक्त्वा स चलितः. {@--3@} Attained. {@--4@} Known, understood. {@--5@} Removed, displaced. (see चल्). --तं {@--1@} Shaking, moving. {@--2@} Going, walking. {@--3@} A kind of dance; चलितं नाम नाट्यमंतरंण <ls>M. 1.</ls>
